# Extendicare

## MAINTENANCE INSPECTION CHECKLIST### Equipment Exit Lighting#### LEGEND/KEY| LEGEND | KEY       |
|--------|-----------|
| W      | Weekly    |
| M      | Monthly   |
| Q      | Quarterly |
| S      | Semi-Annual |
| A      | Annual    |
| O      | Ok       |
| R      | Repair    |
| N      | Replace   |**Name:**
**Year:**
**Unit No.:**
**Manufacturer:** All
**Model:** DC Power Supply| W | M | Q | S | A | Item                                                                 |
|---|---|---|---|---|----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1. Check that exit signs are in the proper position and not damaged. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 2. Check that arrows point in the correct direction. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 3. Check that bulbs are illuminated. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 4. Test emergency lighting operation and record time lit (minutes) on back of this page. Operate lighting a minimum of 1 hour on battery power. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 5. Check battery water level if applicable. Add distilled water as necessary. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 6. Check terminals for corrosion. Clean as required. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 7.

Clean as required. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 7. Record voltage reading on back of this page. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 8. Check on/ready indicator is functioning properly. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 9. Check charge indicator is functioning properly. |
|   |   | X |   |   | 10. Check lamp(s) are functioning properly. (Central Systems only) Refer to “Stand-by Generator Inspection SPECIFICATIONS” for annual requirements. * |
|   |   |   |   |   | **NOTE:** The services of qualified personnel may be required. |----### Monthly Checklist| JAN | FEB | MAR | APR | MAY | JUN |
